## Matrix4x4.getNearPlane() method

Get near clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNearPlane(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The near clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that this is a projection matrix (perspective or orthogonal).
